website_summaries.verdict: Get to your binoculars on short notice with this well-designed bag from Eyeskey.
pros: Oxford fabric construction, which is good for protection and storage
Choice of 42 millimeter or 50 millimeter case
Thoughtful design layout gives you easy access
cons: Hook-and-loop closure could be more secure

customer_reviews.title: Great Case and Great Price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of Leica binoculars which now come with an "Adventure Strap." It is a combination neck strap and case all in one. Good idea but it just doesn't work well. Instead of being the best of both worlds it kind of sucks as both a neck strap and a case. So, I bought a harness and this case to go with my new Leica binoculars and it works perfectly. I love that the strap disconnects because I just use the harness straps on the binoculars and the case strap just gets in the way.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Waggener

customer_reviews.title: Light, well made and inexpensive case.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case to hold my new Eoncore digital camera binoculars, which is sold without a case. This one fits perfectly and is very light. It's very well made and appears to be very durable and strong. The price is very reasonable as well. The only improvement that could be made is if this product had a small pocket on the outside, to hold an instruction booklet or lens wipes, etc. Otherwise, exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S. F.

customer_reviews.title: I have the binoculars That are supposed to fit in this case.
customer_reviews.text: I have the binoculars That are supposed to fit in this case. But I can't believe how much smaller than the binoculars the case is. Sorry I bought this. I also bought the strap on the same page. Now I have to pay shipping costs to return them. And they don't even fit like the site said. Unhappy about it.
customer_reviews.author: Long time Happy Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. I picked up a pair of older binoculars at a resale shop that was in really good shape. Name brand, the optics were flawless and they just looked neglected and needed a thorough cleaning. Afterwards, they turned out really nice so I needed something to keep them in. This product was the perfect size and at $15, good value. Between these and the $5 I paid for the superior optics on the binoculars, I now have a nice kit to use and only spent a grand total of $20. Nice!
customer_reviews.author: Wiseguy

customer_reviews.title: Fits my night vision device.
customer_reviews.text: This case works with a variety of binoculars. Measure your binocular at the maximum dimensions then compare to those in the description. I did it like that and bought the case for a night vision device. Fits like a glove. Message to Amazon sellers: This sale happened because someone included the measurements in the description.
customer_reviews.author: RWalker

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful well constructed case. But go with the larger size.
customer_reviews.text: Well made case and well worth the price, however I would recommend the next larger size for 42mm binoculars. This is perfect for 32mm and pocket size. It would be a bit snug for 42mm.
customer_reviews.author: Gary M.

customer_reviews.title: Face shipping not too impressed with product
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money the one that comes with the binoculars seems well made. Not worth buying an additional case
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Look I had a good decent pair of smalll binoculars which needed a bag
customer_reviews.text: Look I had a good decent pair of smalll binoculars which needed a bag , this bag is 5” by 7” small , Just big enough. Cheap bag small piece of Valcro on it to keep it closed . Plastic kinda of like made from suit case material.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Bosh

customer_reviews.title: Quality product value priced
customer_reviews.text: Good case that features a buckle rather than Velcro closure.This is my second case and I’m pleased with both.Eyeskey has reasonably priced products that work well.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa hajek

customer_reviews.title: Good quality case
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case to replace a lost Nikon 8x42 Monarch binocular case. Good fit and good quality case.
customer_reviews.author: William R. Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Nice case
customer_reviews.text: Fits my Bushnell 42mm binoculars great. Looks pretty well-made. We’ll see how it holds up when we take the case/binoculars camping. Good price for the case.
customer_reviews.author: HMP

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Returned it because even though I measured the binoculars first, and the measurements shown in the listing indicated a perfect fit, it was actually too small for the case to close when the binoculars were in it. The closure was just a hook-and-loop strip that didn't seem like it would hold very securely, too. They have a larger size that I still might try, with a clasp. Shipping was quick, return was easy.
customer_reviews.author: WI

customer_reviews.title: The optics are also excellent. I ordered a carrying case from Amazon which ...
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with the build quality of the glasses. The optics are also excellent. I ordered a carrying case from Amazon which ended up being too small for my binoculars. It would have been nice to have had a carrying case be a part of the original order. Do you have any recommendations?
customer_reviews.author: moses hall

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my camera-equipped binoculars. Sometimes, I like the case better than what it houses.
customer_reviews.author: Joey O

customer_reviews.title: See comment
customer_reviews.text: Return the item that went in here so I returned it also because I didn't ever use for it.
customer_reviews.author: angel

customer_reviews.title: When you buy these binoculars the case and the strap comes with the binoculars.
customer_reviews.text: In Amazon’s description for the binoculars which fit this case there is no reference to either the case or the strap for the binoculars. Just below the picture of the binoculars it states that people who bought these binoculars also bought the case and the strap. This is misinformation as the binoculars come with this case and the strap.
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: Ordered, but need to return
customer_reviews.text: Ordered by mistake, as Eyeskey binoculars did not indicate that a 'case' . There are no indication, when the product arrive (instructions, package, box) that they are also for low light night vision use.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Dollahitel

customer_reviews.title: Fits large Nikon binocs well. Good padding.
customer_reviews.text: Good protection for large Nikon binoculars. Traveled well in checked luggage to South Africa and neighbors.
customer_reviews.author: Headarmor

customer_reviews.title: Great binoculars
customer_reviews.text: These binoculars are the best - love the flip up screen for picture taking
customer_reviews.author: K Robinett

customer_reviews.title: Make sure of the dimensions of your equipment before you order!
customer_reviews.text: Did not fit my binoculars, don’t want to rate positively or negatively. Returned for credit.
customer_reviews.author: K. E. Blair

customer_reviews.title: I new the size of the binoculars and wanted be sure I had a good fit with the case
customer_reviews.text: Product is well made. Advertised dimensions are accurate. This was important as I was trying to find a generic replacement case for an old Bushnell binoculars. I new the size of the binoculars and wanted be sure I had a good fit with the case.
customer_reviews.author: rgw2000

customer_reviews.title: To small
customer_reviews.text: In spite of its description this case is way to small to hold a full size 10x50 binocular
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: No strap
customer_reviews.text: The description says that the case includes a strap. Mine did not. Otherwise, the case is okay.
customer_reviews.author: M. Klinger

customer_reviews.title: Case Goes Well with an $800 Pair of Leica Binoculars!
customer_reviews.text: This case is a little cheaper material and build quality than I had expected, but gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Just The Truth

customer_reviews.title: Totally disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed of Amazon’s recommendation because of 2 reasons, firstly the binoculars came with its own cover and secondly the binoculars dont fit in this cover!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Fermoso

customer_reviews.title: Fits my smaller 10x35 binoculars nicely.
customer_reviews.text: I got soft-sided so they fit in my backpack better.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Engberg

customer_reviews.title: More like a toy
customer_reviews.text: Really small. Do not feel like the quality matched the price. I don’t look for this to hold up long.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy B Sewell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought for binoculars but I'm using in now for other items when I travel.
customer_reviews.author: Joe C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice case for the money
customer_reviews.text: Nice case for the money. Would buy again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Guy

customer_reviews.title: My original case (eaten by a puppy) fit by sliding the binoculars in eyepiece at the bottom. Otherwise this case is well made.
customer_reviews.text: Fit my Jason 50mm perfectly by sliding them in sideways.
customer_reviews.author: Tijerasman

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was the wrong size. I need a larger one.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M. Palmer

customer_reviews.title: My New Eyeskey Bionocular Case
customer_reviews.text: My binoculars fit comfortably into the Eyeskey case. I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Compact case with a snug fit for both the Monarch 5 10x42 and Monarch 7 8x42 binos.
customer_reviews.author: L Corcoran

customer_reviews.title: Does not come close to large enough for my 7X35 binoculars
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money unless you want it for opera glasses.
customer_reviews.author: JON D SILBERMAN

customer_reviews.title: One of the hooks on the strap that is needed ...
customer_reviews.text: One of the hooks on the strap that is needed to attach the strap to the case was broken off. Had to return!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomerAG

customer_reviews.title: Good transaction!
customer_reviews.text: Good for what I purchased it for as a binocular case.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline R. Breuer

customer_reviews.title: Great price, fine product
customer_reviews.text: Everything about it is great. Arrived quickly & appropriately packaged. It's a bit too large for my binocs, but that's my fault for not measuring.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Repurposed Binoculars Case
customer_reviews.text: Well made bag. Using it as camera case. Added 2" strap for comfortable carry.
customer_reviews.author: victor morales

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect ?
customer_reviews.text: My binocular.s fit perfectly in case. The case itself does not offer any protection in the way of insulation in case it's dropped.
customer_reviews.author: Phil C.

product_meta.title: Eyeskey Universal 42mm Roof Prism Binoculars Case, Essential Accessory for Your Valuable Binoculars, and Durable
product_meta.description:
Color:Black-42cm

Product Description

Eyeskey premium binoculars case for 42mm roof prism binoculars is perfect for holding your binoculars. The binoculars carrying bag made of a durable oxford and soft interior. The durable binoculars case features an attractive black exterior and a convenient attach closing system to keep your binoculars secure. The case includes a quick-release buckled shoulder strap. The premium case fits all 42mm roof prism binoculars, making it an ideal travel partner for your binoculars.




We have tried nearly all brands of binoculars in our case, such as bushnell, zeiss, celestron, nikon, wingspan, canon, leica and so on. As a result, our case can fit all . we are proud to present our innovative accessory. 



NOTE: There might be some impression during transportation. Don't worry. It will recover soon.
feature_bullets: Made of Premium durable oxford - protects and stores your expensive outdoor Binoculars.
Adjustable flap keeps it secure and provides a good fit; Soft interior to prevent your 42mm roof prism binoculars from being damaged .
Efficient design allows easy access: The well-planned layout provides room for your binoculars right at your fingertips.
Our case can prevent impacts or scratch, it's semi-waterproof, shockproof, Stylish and Durable. Ensure to prevent any damage to your binoculars.
The detachable shoulder strap is great so you can tote or shoulder your case easily and comfortably.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars128 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
specifications.Best Sellers Rank: #5 in Binocular Cases#17 in Binocular Accessories
